data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

data.partBlankContent: When Akito was in his late twenties, he decided he needed to start saving money for his future. He we__ to t__ bank t_ open u_ a savings acc____, and t__ teller gre____ him war___ and hel___ him fi__ out t__ necessary fo___. Akito dec____ that, a_ least a_ first, h_ would p__ fifty dol____ into th__ account ea__ month. As an incentive to help Akito save money, the teller explained to him that he would earn interest on the money in his savings account.
data.answer: 当秋藤快30岁的时候，他决定开始为自己的未来存钱。他去银行开一个储蓄帐户，出纳员热情地向他打招呼，并帮他填了两张必要的表格。秋藤决定，至少在开始的时候，他每个月要往那个账户里存入50美元。作为帮助秋藤存钱的激励措施，出纳员向他解释说，他将从储蓄账户上的钱中赚取利息。
